title: Freshman Fangs
description: High school is never easy. Try going through high school while you are a night walker, in other words, a vampire.Kayla Van Gayte was just an ordinary 14-year-old girl until she was dared to walk deadman's path by her best friend since Pre-K, Kristy Monroe. Walking Deadman's Path was forbidden, but teenagers were always walking it at night against parents' wishes. That is where she met Deryk, a mysterious boy with a mysterious past.
author: Heather Anne Richards
